replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
更新启动器，https://ci.huangyuhui.net/job/HM ... bs/HMCL-3.2.145.exe

然后启动器设置，下载源，mcbbs

再删除 .minecraft\libraries 文件夹
应该是MOD问题，你启动无forge原版试试
